===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# sound
# echo
# news, messages

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to make a noise
#: {{zh-x|電話 響 了。|The phone is '''ringing'''.}}
#*: {{zh-x|濕水 炮仗 點 會 響？|How does a wet firecracker '''go off'''?|C|ref={{w|zh:許冠傑|許冠傑}}, {{w|zh:半斤八兩|半斤八兩}}}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to be at a place
#: {{zh-x|你 響 邊？|Where '''are''' you?|C}}
#: {{zh-x|我 響 你 隔籬。|I '''am''' next to you.|C}}
#: {{zh-x|我 響 處{syu3}。|I '''am''' here.|C}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to be at}}
{{zh-dial|在}}

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# able to make a noise
#: {{zh-x|響板|castanets}}

#: {{zh-x|響亮|loud and clear}}
# famous, reputed
# having a great impact
